channel.title: Vellum on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in Vellum on Petfactory

item.title: Houdini - Vellum
item.description: General Vellum is a simulation framework that uses an extended Position Based Dynamics approach. It can be used to create many different things including cloth, hair, softbodies, balloons, and grains. The main advantage of a Position Based Approach is its controllability, stability, and ability to produce believable results quickly. Graph Coloring Graph Coloring Graph coloring is a process where the primitives are segmented into non overlapping sets, where no set shares points.
